entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as standing beside Harry, slightly hunched, and next to a woman who greatly resembles him.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as one of the two girls standing apart from their parents, and she seems to be pleading with her sister.

entities.name: sister
entities.description: The sister of Lily is mentioned as being on the other side of a plea from Lily.

relationships.description: Snape was staring at a family of four, and specifically at Lily, who seemed to be pleading with her sister.
Since Snape was staring at the family of four, which includes Lily and her sister, it can be inferred that he is also gazing at the sister.
